name: UV SouthSourcing
tag_list: united-virtualities, uv-southsourcing, rich-media, digital-production, development, design
overview:
UV SouthSourcing, an independent unit of digital marketing solutions group United Virtualities, was founded in late 2009 with the mission of providing well oiled digital production and outsourcing services for US based Publishers, Agencies and Ad Networks with the most competitive prices while upholding to the highest quality standards. UV SouthSourcing is a web factory modeled as the traditional software factory; instead of delivering software, we deliver solutions for digital advertising campaigns and web-based software. Our current clients includes agencies of the Big 5 as well as independent agencies in the US, Canada and Europe.
